author: Mattie Jones
comment: Have had this app "installed" on my HTC m8 all day and there was never an icon to open the app and it never synced with my gear live or the gear live app. I installed/reinstalled before reading the commentary so now I can't get a refund...very frustrated, I was excited for this watch face. I installed multiple watch faces today and this is the only one that won't sync.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Mattie.

We have a solution that has worked for other customers please re-consider your rating if it works.

You must update your Android OS on your phone to the latest version, also your android wear device needs to update to the latest version.

https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6321140?hl=en-GB

Kind Regards

Emerald Co

title: Doesn't work

author: Phil Bayfield
comment: Didn't show up after an hour so had to refund. Nexus 6P + Huawei Watch. Tried to install again after developer left feedback and it still doesn't work although other faces I tried at random all worked without issue.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Phil,

 We have many paying customers who have installed our app with  no problems. This fault is an android wear issue unrelated to our app. You can verify this for yourself by downloading another wear app and seeing the same result. Please reconsider your 1 star rating as it is hurting our app in these early stages.

title: Doesn't work

author: Andrew Lee
comment: Install only took 30 seconds on a Zenwatch 2.  Such a gorgeous face.  I love staring at at.  The only problem is that when I power the watch off and on, the settings don't seem to stay, forcing me to always play with the settings when I turn my watch on at the start of my day.  This is not a problem for those that leave their watch on 24/7, but I turn it off at night.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Andrew, 

This is a known issue and part of how we save battery. This watch is still in it's early stages and we're working on fixing that.

Thank you for your positive review, we are glad that you enjoy our product, we will be working on a fix for your saving issue in our next update.

Kind Regards
ES

author: annette curtis
comment: Been installed for 2 days and won't appear on the watch. Checked for updates on my watch and phone. All is up to date and nothing. Wasted $.99.....

author: Ryan Williamson
comment: The face looks nice, installed without problem, and runs fairly smoothly. Unfortunately the date, time, and battery are noticeably off center even after a reboot. This is on a Huawei watch.
title: Really off center

author: Jasley R
comment: Works and showed up after 2 minutes installing. Just one complaint, display of date and battery not at the center of my watch. LG G Watch R (1st edition)

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello there,

Thanks for bringing this to our attention, our engineers will get on it right away, in the meantime we hope you've enjoyed our product.

Kind Regards

ES

author: Spoonie 82
comment: I enjoy this watch face but the Google now cards appear too large than they do on other watch faces also should have changeable settings on the phone as well not just the watch.
title: Lovely watch face but still room for improvement!

author: David B
comment: I wish more watch faces were like this, full lwp. Slightly stutters at times, hoping for an update in the future.
title: Lwp watch face

author: Gee Bee
comment: on urbane 2. however i found the time and date a bit too small. please give option to resize and i will purchase. i think this maybe due to the high resolution of urbane 2.
title: Worked almost perfect...

author: silver streak
comment: Plz can add adjust for clock place (top,bottom, middle) thanks for cool app

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Thanks for your suggestion Muhammad, 


We will look into developing your suggestion in our next update, we have actually planned to include something similar for quite some time now.

Thank you very much for your kind rating, it is greatly appreciated
-ES

title: Request for amazing app

comment: Never showed up on watch

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Cliff,

Other users have had this problem before, it is actually an android wear issue and unrelated to our face. If you attempt to install a free application to your watch you would observe the same issue. Please reconsider your rating as it is hurting us in this early stage of promotion

Kind regards

author: Nestor Nestor
comment: It keeps my toddlers son curious and busy for a minute ;)
title: Not Bat

comment: Thank you for your app  Ok

author: Karla Woodman
comment: Looks awesome on my ZenWatch 2!

author: Markey Pappalardo
comment: I already had the live aquarium on my phone, and now I have it on my watch! It works great and also great customer support! I thought there was a problem with installing initially, but you just need to wait around 10 - 15 mins since the app is around 27MB. Can't wait for the new features you listed.
title: Love it on my new Moto 360 Women's watch!

author: Jan Hackett
comment: I'm very impressed with the customer service for this app.  They worked on a fix for the problems I was having  my Moto 360 gen 2.  Thanks for the quick response and fast update.  I'll definitely download more apps from this company.  Great customer service!

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Please tell us your watch model and we will get right on fixing your issue, in return please reconsider your rating.

ES

title: Moto 360 gen 2

author: rielle ritchie
comment: I installed the app, but then it vanished. I can't find it in my Android wear files or watch face selection on the actual watch. I restarted the phone and the watch. I even uninstalled the app and reinstalled (which voided the return policy) I'm very confused. I gave 5 stars because I have faith in your watch making abilities and your customer service but I'm stuck. Please help.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Rielle,

We will make sure we get to the bottom of your issue, if there is no solution we will offer a full refund. Thank you for your 5 star rating it is greatly appreciated. Which model of phone and android wear watch are you using? if you know your android phone and watch OS version too this can help us. email this to callan102@gmail.com.

title: Um. Help?

author: Julian Curtis-Zilius
comment: I just recently acquired a android wear, and have been debating on which watch face to use. This face is really nice. You can customize the tank and the fish in your tank. The only ability I wish it has was to change the font settings of the actual time.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Julian,

Thanks for your kind review. We will be sure to include your suggestion for our next update.

We appreciate the kind review and are glad you like the app.

Regards

ES

title: Amazing watch face!

author: Joharah Reigert
comment: Said it installed but didn't so uninstalled  and re-installed and still nothing. 😠

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Joharah,

We're sorry you've had this experience, usually waiting between 15-20 minutes should be long enough but it is known to take longer, we discourage installing and reinstalling

title: Where's my app????

author: IDLE 0095
comment: Weather when will it come.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello there,

We are working hard to implement a variety of new features, the weather being one of them. Currently we need more sale to finance the extra work to add everything in, hopefully the app will do well and finance itself, please reconsider your rating as it is hurting us in these early stages of promotion

Regards

ES

title: Weather

author: Mindgasm Music
comment: This is one of the most beautiful watch faces I've ever come across.  It's got a fluid animation, and it doesn't drain your battery!.  It makes your watch look truly state of the art, classy and elegant. Everyone in the office has complimented it at least once. I'll be in a meeting and my watch will turn on and someone will make note of the nice "fish aquarium" on my wrist.  As far as these other reviews are concerned I have experienced none of the problems they have; The watch face installs and runs fine with my setup. I've also easily found the customisation options, you access them by pressing a little gear at the bottom of the watch face in the watch face selection screen.  You can change the aquarium background, customise each fish in the aquarium and change things like 24/12 hour, to display the date etc.  All on top of this the battery life is incredible, lasting a lot longer than any other animated watch face I've tried.  All in all, nothing short of the best watch face I've tried so far.

author: Rodney Ackerman
comment: Wish I could give ZERO stars. Does NOT work only causes problems with the connection between my watch and phone. Avoid!

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Rodney,

We here at Emerald software do our best to ensure that all our apps are of the highest possible quality, We test our apps extensively before every release. We have never experienced the issue you're describing. Please tell us your watch model and we will get right on fixing your issue, in return please reconsider your rating.

ES

author: Nestor
comment: It's deceptive to say the app does things that do not exist.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content: There is a massive range of customisation options available, as displayed in the screen shots, you can find the customisations options by clicking on the little gear underneath the watch face in the watch face selection screen (our watch face is customised with the watch not the phone) a youtube video showing this: https://youtu.be/A7MS_Xip-R0?t=21

title: Where's the customization?

author: Jama-Et Emtu
comment: Wow, incredible. I have a fishtanks on my wrist!  Took a while to install because I'm guessing it's a pretty large app, once it installed I fell in love with it, absolutely gorgeous, has been my daily driver for a while now, doesn't drain the battery and looks amazing, 5 stars!  PS. Please add jellyfish!

author: Sharat Umbombo
comment: Wonderful watch face, loads of customisation, fluid animation and doesn't eat the battery. A brilliant chrisms present. thank you emerald software!

author: E Alpha
comment: A beautiful app, please make more!

author: Dambara Dambara
comment: Incredibly elegant, very well made

author: Lina Intisaar
comment: I've always wanted a live aquarium watch face to match my phone, and now finally I can! Beautiful graphics, highly customisable, and doesn't eat my battery. A lot cheaper than other watch faces too. Really good for value. Very happy with this!
title: Easily the best watch face

author: Leche Brown
comment: Battery drain quick!! I have the first gen moto 360 it's great battery life, but this app quickly drain the battery, while on charge it took 45 min to go from 40% to 50% that normally takes 5min or less,
title: Nope

author: Hrushikesh Ghatpande
comment: The animation is too heavy for my Moto 360 1st gen. It crashed my watch completely.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
Hello Hrushikeshl,

This is not an issue we have encountered before, if you could possibly please give us more information and we'll work on a solution right away, firstly if you could tell us if you've tried powering off and on the face, in addition if you could possibly try to update your software to the latest version.

Kind Regards

ES

title: Great concept but crashed

author: John Eckert
comment: Huge battery drain.  My watch would not fully charge while using this watch face.

reply.author: Emerald Co.
reply.content:
to use as little battery as possible, in fact one of the reasons we built it how we did was to create a beautifully animated face that doesn't eat the battery.

We believe these issues you are encountering are due to an android wear malfunction.

Please reconsider your 1 star rating as it is hurting us in this early stage

Regards

ES
